title: Moonrider Outpost
textb: Immediate: Spend 4 progress. Discard threat and +2 Food dice.
textc: Immediate: Spend 10 progress. Burn threat and +3 Food dice.

title: The Whitehell
textb: Effect: Channeling costs two conditions for remainder of season.
textc: Action: Test Lore 3. Success: Gain +2 Mana dice and burn card. Failure: +1 Discord.
texte: Special: Place obstacle in spotlight player's staging area.

title: Placement: Red Banks Location
texta: Action: Test Command 3. Success: Discard bandits. Failure: +1 Discord.
textb: (SNEAKY) Flip attached location card. Location is unusuable for remainder of the season. Move card to a different Red Banks location.

title: Action: Spend 3 Timber to place one progress.
texta: Immediate: Spend 3 progress. Discard threat and +2 Food dice.
